values: This journal is going 'Friends Only' =) Give Ohkura loves and leave me comment~ XD FO banner credit to

I love making ringtones for my own cellphone - most of them are from my favourite songs :) And since I've made quite a lot (and have deleted some =_=;;), I think I might as well share it hehe Mostly are under 50 seconds Kiseki by Greeeen HOME by Shimizu Shota Giri Giri HERO by Mihimaru GT LALALA by Kato Miliyah feat. Wakadanna Prisoner of Love by Utada Hikaru Heavenly Days by Aragaki Yui Wahaha by Kanjani8 Odore by Micro Niji by Fukuyama Masaharu Blue Bird by Ikimonogakari Good Night Baby by ayaka Rocket Sneakers by Otsuka Ai Do comment if taking and please do not repost anywhere!

I don't know how long it has been when I watched Japanese drama. This season's drama has a lot to offer! There are about ten dramas that I'm interested in and I've already watched two first-episodes now, I like both. First one is Tenchijin which will be the second taiga drama I'm watching; the first one was Atsuhime (Aoi Miyazaki and Eita - woot!) The casts in Tenchijin are pretty much droolable as well: Tsumabuki Satoshi, Kitamura Kazuki, Oguri Shun, Hiroshi Abe, Shirota Yu, Hiroshi Abe (and not exactly exciting for me; but Aibu Saki, Takako Tokiwa, Masami Nagasawa for the actresses) I think I'm going to enjoy this one a lot :) The second one is TRIANGLE. Not exactly interested at first, because I dislike Inagaki Goro (specifically, his hair) but the story is too interesting to be ditched. Apparently, the first episode has left me (and others) hanging with a lot of twist in the story; which means I'll be following this drama as well :) Other choices: - Voice (Eita, Ikuta Toma, Ishihara Satomi) - Mei-chan no Shitsuji (Eikura Nana, Mizushima Hiro, Sato Takeru, Mukai Osamu, Yamada Yu - wootness!) - Love Shuffle (Tamaki Hiroshi, Karina, Matsuda Shota, and special cast: DAIGO!) - Kiina (Kanno Miho! - This is enough to make me want to watch it lol) - Zeni Geba (Matsuyama Kenichi!!) - Hissatsu Shigotonin 2009 (OHKURA) - Uta no Oniisan (Not exactly interested, but casts are Ohno Satoshi, Maruyama Ryuuhei! Can't remember the others..) - Naniwa no Hana (Kuriyama Chiaki, don't know who the guy is)
Tegomass is Takitsuba Ver. 2 with a better quality. EDIT: I'm still accepting request for this XD

I remember posting about a 100-photo challenge which I never gotten to do at all (and I feel bad..), now I think this is easier and I'm sure I will do it XD

Ask me to take pictures of any aspect of my life that you're interested in/curious about, it can be anything from my house to my room to my favorite book. Leave your requests as a comment to this entry, I'll snap the pictures and post them in the following post.

Taken from <lj user=renchan5>

I have nothing to offer :/ I'm such a bad friend.. Anyway, just inserted a header made by :3 It's Ohkura and she wishes me happy birthday (my birthday is next week though.. but oh well). Thanks a load <333 I like it :D

I just got home a while ago, and it's 1.20 am here now, let me just wish you guys..

MERRY CHRISTMAS!!!

Omedetou gozaimasu to Kanjani8 for successfully and safely finishing the 47 prefectures tour!
To Kanjani8 who have given their best in each and every show, Kansai Jrs who have followed 8 throughout Japan, Staff-san, Baku-san, and to all who have helped.. Otsukaresama deshita! Many things have happened during this 5 months; funny moments to touching moments, all are just memorable. And also, to fans who have went all the way to watch the shows, arigatou <3 Even though I didn't attend any of the shows, it was fun reading all the reports, listening to all the recordings and watching all the fancams :) Kore kara mou ganbatte! atashitachi mou zutto ouenshitemasu kara! <3
